global_colors_info=”{%22#1d3557%22:%91%22link_text_color%22%93,%22#0e0c19%22:%91%22header_text_color%22,%22header_4_text_color%22,%22header_3_text_color%22,%22header_2_text_color%22,%22header_5_text_color%22,%22header_6_text_color%22%93,%22#457b9d%22:%91%22quote_border_color%22%93}”]

Gain the ultimate edge for your business with our exclusive membership, providing access to the most trusted dropshipping suppliers. Keep reading for essential Dropshipping FAQs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Frequently Asked Questions” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”1339.8px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_font_size_phone=”24px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_font_size_tablet=”22px” header_3_font_size_phone=”17px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_4_font_size_tablet=”18px” header_4_font_size_phone=”15px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_5_font_size_tablet=”15px” header_5_font_size_phone=”14px” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_6_font_size_tablet=”13px” header_6_font_size_phone=”13px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get answers to the most common questions about Dropshipping and the Dropshipping suppliers we list to help you understand the benefits and features of joining Infinity Phoenix.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#457b9d” open_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” toggle_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#457b9d” use_icon_font_size=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”73efbc9d-37bf-4f75-b3d8-498640ef079f” toggle_text_color=”#111111″ toggle_font=”|IBM Plex Sans Condensed_weight|||||||” toggle_font_size=”18px” toggle_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”|IBM Plex Sans_weight|||||||” body_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.64)” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.75em” toggle_font_size_tablet=”15px” toggle_font_size_phone=”14px” toggle_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”15px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”rgba(0,0,0,0.08)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-36fd78a7-34bc-404d-873c-dafa34efaae5%22:%91%22quote_icon_color%22%93,%22gcid-3e0ae39b-d026-4173-b444-0c785917aeff%22:%91%22body_text_color%22%93,%22gcid-828accbb-1ed2-407d-95be-20ab4e191566%22:%91%22border_color_all%22%93,%22#457b9d%22:%91%22icon_color%22,%22open_toggle_text_color%22%93}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the benefits of working with a Infinity Phoenix Certified Dropshipper?” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”550abe5c-b505-4d6b-adc7-570bd7cc1217″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Working with a Infinity Phoenix Certified Dropshipper offers numerous advantages for your online business. But most importantly, they are Verified Suppliers. All dropshippers in our Directory are thoroughly vetted and certified, ensuring you work with reputable and reliable suppliers.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Will the Dropshippers send the orders to my customers?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Yes, absolutely! Dropshippers will handle the entire fulfillment process for you. This means they will pack and ship the orders directly to your customers, allowing you to focus on marketing and growing your business without the hassle of managing inventory or logistics.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do I have to setup an account with each supplier that has products I want to sell?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”550abe5c-b505-4d6b-adc7-570bd7cc1217″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Yes, you need to set up an account with each supplier whose products you want to sell. This process allows you to establish a direct relationship with the supplier, gain access to their inventory, and receive accurate pricing and shipping information. Each supplier has their own requirements and terms for setting up an account, so make sure to pay attention to what we post on their listings, and say on their websites. 

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do the Dropshippers charge fees too?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”550abe5c-b505-4d6b-adc7-570bd7cc1217″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

No, not at all! We do not list any suppliers that require setup or membership fees.

The only additional costs you’ll encounter with genuine dropshipping are handling fees, often referred to as Dropship Fees. These cover the expenses related to warehousing the product, packaging individual orders, and shipping them to your customers—the essential “handling” part of Shipping and Handling.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do I have to be a legal business with a tax ID?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”550abe5c-b505-4d6b-adc7-570bd7cc1217″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Absolutely! To work with genuine dropshippers, you need to be a legitimate business as well. This involves registering your business name and obtaining a tax ID.

Keep in mind that requirements can vary by location, so it’s always a good idea to check with your State’s Department of Revenue for the most up-to-date information.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Where do I get the product images and information for my store?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”550abe5c-b505-4d6b-adc7-570bd7cc1217″ global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Once your account with a supplier is approved, they’ll guide you on how to access all the essential information for your store.

  • Some suppliers provide product details individually on their website pages.

  • Others offer downloadable files for easy access.

  • Some even allow you to connect directly to their system, automatically populating your store with product information.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”I checked out the Free Preview and couldn’t find a supplier match for what I’m looking for. How can you help?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

Reach out to us, and we’ll look into it for you! Simply use the Contact Us page and send us a message detailing what you’re searching for.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”/membership-faqs/” button_text=”Membership FAQs” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”/wholesale-faqs/” button_text=”Wholesale FAQs” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
